My cats and I love the rainy weather in Portland!

I play disc golf because it's a good way to get exercise and spend time outdoors with my collie.

content.text: Hi! My name is Emily. What's yours?
My name is Michelle. I'm from California.
Nice to meet you Michelle! I'm from Portland, Oregon.
Cool! I've never been to Oregon. What's it like there?
It's great! The weather is rainy most of the time, but it's a beautiful place. I love the mountains and the forests.
I love the rain! I'm not a big fan of the sun.
Me neither! I love to stay inside and knit.
That's awesome! I love to knit too!
What kind of things do you like to knit?
I like to knit hats and scarves. I'm also trying to learn how to knit socks.
Socks are hard! I've never been able to knit them.
I've only made one pair, so I'm still a beginner.
Well, you're doing better than me! I've never even tried.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion
